definition: to find to one's taste/to pick (after looking at)/Taiwan pr. [xiang4 zhong4]
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right

sentences.english: Thirdly, an initial DO transfer rate is calculated at the aerobic phase.
sentences.chinese: 接著，在好氧相中推估一初始溶氧轉換率。

sentences.english: Amorphous material is one of the most active part of the solid phase of soil.
sentences.chinese: 無定形物質是土的固相中很活躍的一個組成部分。

sentences.english: The best concentration of isopropanol in the mobile phase is 1%.
sentences.chinese: 流動相中異丙醇體積分數以1%爲最佳。

sentences.english: Enzymatic catalysis in non-aqueous phase was one of the most important field in enzyme engineering.
sentences.chinese: 非水相中酶的催化作用是酶工程研究的熱點之一。

sentences.english: As the heptane in oil phase increases, the interfacial tension decreases.
sentences.chinese: 隨着油相中庚烷的增多，界面張力降低。

sentences.english: The research about chiral separation of medicine by enzyme catalysis in organic solven…
sentences.chinese: 本文將對有機相中手性藥物的酶促拆分研究進行綜述。

sentences.english: Before I moved from here, the estate on the right hadn't finished.
sentences.chinese: 當我還未搬離這裏，相中右側的屋村仍未建成。

sentences.english: The dominant bacteria in the initial count was Pseudomonas.
sentences.chinese: 冷卻肉上的初始菌相中以假單胞菌屬爲優勢菌。

sentences.english: In solid film, these coumarin-conjugated porphyrins still maintain high energy transfer efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現在固相中這些卟啉也有很高的能量轉移效率。

sentences.english: Experiments on organic acids conversion in methanogenic phase of the two phase anaerobic process were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 研究了兩相厭氧系統產甲烷相中有機酸轉化規律。

sentences.english: The nano-CaCO3 suspension was wet modified via water phase.
sentences.chinese: 在水相中對納米碳酸鈣懸浮液進行溼法改性。

sentences.english: She was discovered during her third year of high school.
sentences.chinese: 她是在高三的時候被經紀公司相中的。

sentences.english: In addition, two papillary thyroid carcinomas showed faint uptake of (superscript 99m)Tc-MIBI on delayed image.
sentences.chinese: 另外，兩處甲狀腺乳突癌亦於延遲相中呈現輕度攝取。

to look upon/to take a fancy to/to fall for
to look for/to seek/to choose/color of object/color of fleece (of domestic animal)/to see/to notice/all kinds of things/odds and ends
to choose/to pick/to settle upon/to decide upon a candidate/to be selected for some role
to admire
to appreciate/to recognize the worth of sth/appreciation
to win instant success (idiom)/to become an instant hit
to have one's wishes fulfilled
to recommend sb/to give a referral
to select very carefully
to break the rule/to make an exception
to move (to pity)/arousing (sympathy)/touching
strong card/honor card (card games)/very popular or successful person/self-important
to buy out/buyout/severance
rich and powerful (families)/aristocratic/big shots
to reveal outstanding talent (idiom); to stand out as conspicuously brilliant
